"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559f328b63687279b1000071#post_559f328b63687279b1000071

You reaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaally need to pay attention to the crowd you hang out with. As far as I'm concerned, everyone spams something they're into and does it get annoying at times?

I don't give a shit personally, but some do, why? Because it's the same thing than shoving something down people's throats, and no, that's it's not what you'd call "normal".

Neither of you guys are the good guys, victims, martyrs, bad guys, hitler, stalin, Obama or Putin.

You all have your tastes and that's it. You don't like what the other does? Too bad, he probably doesn't like the stuff you do either.

That's a reality both of you seems to be missing here.
